name: CFTE
slogan: Learning and Innovation platform for Finance 2.0
description:
The Centre for Finance, Technology and Entrepreneurship (CFTE) is an education platform and an exclusive professional network at the intersection of finance and technology. Through online courses and community events, CFTE provides the knowledge, skills, and relationships needed to successfully navigate the rapidly changing world of finance.

We work with leading Universities to create education programmes such as:
- Fintech Mooc with Hong Kong University: First Fintech Mooc from Asia, trained more than 35K students at the end of 2018
- AI in Finance with Ngee Ann Polytechnic (Singapore): Largest online course on the applications of Artificial Intelligence on the Financial Services industry
- First Fintech Hybrid Specialisation with EDHEC Business School (France)

We design training frameworks with small and large organisation and collaborate with experts from Academia and the industry to provide our learners with cutting edge Knowledge. 

It's an exciting time to be in Finance today!

jobs.title: Business Development Junior
jobs.description:
Who We Are?
The Centre for Finance, Technology & Entrepreneurship is a global provider of corporate training services, online courses and talent development. We believe emerging technologies and innovation are giving birth to a new era of finance, one that can have a positive impact on the lives of billions. We want to use the power of education to train a whole generation of finance professionals to adapt to a world of technology-driven finance and to give them the skills to thrive in this period of step change. 

What makes CFTE special? 
When we say we bet on people - it's not a commercial moto. We really do. We are working hard to create a platform of lifelong learning because we do believe "learn to learn" is the true skill of the 21st century. Naturally, we apply this paradigm to ourselves. 
In the past year, we have grown tremendously, opened offices in London and Singapore, and educated 40,000+ learners in 140+ countries. And we would like to invite outstanding people to join our journey.

Who We Are Looking For:
We are looking for a junior salesperson to join our team. You will be the main driver of our B2B sales efforts, and help to make CFTE the number one choice for Fintech education and training for professionals worldwide. You will also be representing CFTE, as the first point of contact, with our potential learners, who usually come from an amazing community of Fintech enthusiasts. The opportunity to widen your network is immense.

What You Will Be Doing:
- Converting leads into customers through various channels including online chat box, phone, and emails
- Meeting set daily, weekly, and monthly sales targets
- Organising and maintaining your own pipeline, ensuring nothing is missed
- Using CRM system to effectively document and track progress
- Contributing to building training programme for sales team, and creating scalable processes
- Contributing to the company's overall strategy
- Giving feedback to the product development team and marketing team to improve

Qualities and requirements:
- Minimum of 1- year experience in sales – we value face to face, telephone and high intensity experience
- Highly motivated sales professional
- Successful track record of hitting sales/ revenue targets
- A self-starter, motivated and hungry, ready to hit the ground running
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills
- Outstanding telephone and email manners
- Be organised, responsible

What’s in it for you?

- Join a rapidly growing company building the future of education in finance. Size doesn’t matter, we are less than 20 but already reached thousands of learners, worked exceptional people from Harvard, Imperial College, HSBC, Citi, Ping An or Lloyds.
- Working on some of the most important topics of today: Digital transformation, Technology disruption, Lifelong learning, Shift to an entrepreneurial age. All of which you will need in the future, whether in a corporate or start-ups.
- Measure rapidly how your input impacts our company and if you can reach hundreds of learners.
- Expose yourself to the Startup ecosystems in Europe and Asia and be part of the people building it.
- Enjoy and work from Level 39, with an exceptional view on London

You have what it takes to join us? Tell us what you can do for the company and why we should hire you.

NB: The recruitment process includes a video interview, a case study and a meeting with the cofounders.

jobs.title: Fintech Internship
jobs.description:
We're always looking for new talents to join the team and help on a wide range of activities spanning from communications, Business Analysis, Videography, Curriculum design, business development and software engineering.

We are looking for hard-working, committed and motivated candidates who are eager to learn and join a smart team of individuals.

Per the nature of the Internship, we're not looking for specific roles or backgrounds but for motivated talents whom we'll train, mentor and put in charge of a specific CFTE project.

Moreover, we are building a community of individuals and organisations that are shaping the future of the financial industry, joining for an internship would allow you to be part of CFTE ecosystem.

There is no requirement for background education, but having at least one relevant experience in a startup (or other organisation) & being smart, hardworking, and entrepreneurial are a must. 

You’re not expected to be an expert in Fintech but interest in technology and innovation with some curiosity for Finance are a good start. In fact, the most important thing for us would be your hunger to learn. CFTE has the goal to build a lifelong learning platform – we naturally apply our purpose to our own organisation.

We're currently looking for interns in London, Singapore, and Hong Kong.
Long term (>3months) and full-time internships are preferable but we're open to discussion for shorter periods and part-time commitment.

-----
*Open internships currently include:*

- **Events and Ecosystem**: support our team delivering events and seminars across the globe with CFTE Faculty
- **Digital Production & Media**: support our team producing leading online courses and cutting edge content pieces on the future of Finance
- **Partnership & CRM**: support our team structuring and delivering high impact partnerships and build up shared value with leading institutions
- **Growth Marketing**: support our team engineering our growth funnel and scaling our reach.
- **Content & Coms**: support our team putting together the marketing strategy around our products and designing large scale communications campaigns
- **Product**: support our product team developing our leading reference online courses (AI in Finance, Fintech, Open Banking, etc.) and driving CFTE's fintech thought leadership initiatives
- **Operations & Tech**: support our operations and technology team building up the leading education platform transforming the Finance Industry

-----
The application process usually includes a video call, a case study and a physical interview with our management team.

So what are you waiting for?

You’ll be joining a small but highly motivated team who’s building the future of education in finance. Although we’re small, we’re punching way above our weight, and are supported by exceptional people from Harvard, Imperial College, Hong Kong University, HSBC, Citi, Ping An or Lloyds.

You’ll be working on some of the most important topics of today: Digital transformation, disruptive business models, emerging technologies, among many others.

You’ll have direct inputs on a global project aimed to train hundreds of thousands of people.

You can expect to be trained by some of the leading Fintech Entrepreneurs and Educators. 

You’ll have access to our latest educational content and develop a true understanding of Fintech – starting with Around Fintech in 8 hours our fintech foundation course.

You will also be exposed to the start-up ecosystems in Europe, Asia and MENA, with a chance to participate in the construction of an ecosystem of exceptional people and organizations.

jobs.title: Growth Marketer
jobs.description:
Who We Are
The Centre for Finance, Technology & Entrepreneurship is a global provider of corporate training services, online courses and talent development. We believe emerging technologies and innovation are giving birth to a new era of finance, one that can have a positive impact on the lives of billions. We want to use the power of education to train a whole generation of finance professionals to adapt to a world of technology-driven finance and to give them the skills to thrive in this period of step change. 

What makes CFTE special? 
When we say we bet on people - it's not a commercial moto. We really do. We are working hard to create a platform of lifelong learning because we do believe "learn to learn" is the true skill of the 21st century. Naturally we apply this paradigm to ourselves. 
In the past year, we have grown tremendously, opened offices in London and Singapore, and educated 30,000+ learners in 100+ countries. And we would like to invite outstanding people to join our journey.

Who We Are Looking For:
As a candidate, we’re looking for an exceptional individual who will lead our Acquisition efforts: using the full marketing mix (Ads, SEO, Content, Social Media, Email, Events) you’ll be in charge of optimising our acquisition Funnel and scaling our pipeline of leads worldwide. You will work directly with the communications, content and Event teams but also with CFTE Leadership as you will drive one of the priorities on our 2020 roadmap.
 
What You Will Be Doing:
- Qualify Market Segments and targeting criterias for CFTE personas
- Design our B2C/B2B Acquisition funnel and optimise it’s KPI 
- Creating scalable business processes using modern digital marketing tactics
- Set up CFTE’s best practice in terms of Targeting, Acquisition and Conversion
- Contributing to the company's overall Growth strategy


Qualities and requirements:
- Solid understanding of modern marketing channels and practices such as PPC, SEO, content marketing, social media 
- Experience in designing and optimising a Customer Acquisition Funnel 
- Data driven and analytical with experience using Google Analytics and other tools as well as defining relevant tests environment 
- Experience using email marketing automation software and CRM to deliver marketing campaigns and set up lead scoring mechanisms
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills 
- Ability to set priorities, plan, organize, delegate, and control where necessary 
- Has proven ability to work with others in a collaborative, fast-paced environment to deliver marketing campaigns against tight deadlines. 
- Adaptability will be part of your DNA 
- Proactive and a natural problem solver who is able to break down and simplify complex solutions 
- Strong judgement and reasoning skills

Experience:
- At least 2 years of Experience as Digital Marketer in charge of Acquisition
- Worked in a startup or in other fast growth environment
- Familiarity with Innovation, Fintech and Continuous Education are a plus


What’s in it for you? 

On top of a competitive salary, you will be joining a small but highly motivated team who’s building the future of education in finance. Although we’re small, we’re punching way above our weight, and are supported by exceptional people from Harvard, Imperial College, Hong Kong University, HSBC, Citi, Ping An or Lloyds.
You will be working on some of the most important topics of today: Digital transformation, Technology disruption, Lifelong learning and continuous adaptation, Shift to an entrepreneurial age.
You will have direct inputs on a global project aimed to train hundreds of thousands of people.
You can expect to be working closely with and trained by people who are amongst the top Fintech influencers and have coached dozens of entrepreneurs.
You will have access to our latest educational content and develop a true understanding of Fintech – starting with Around Fintech in 8 hours, our fintech foundation course, moving on to AI in Finance – the leading course about Artificial Intelligence in Finance.
You will also be exposed to the Startup ecosystems in Europe and Asia. And participate to the construction of an ecosystem of exceptional people and organizations.
Finally, you will be joining us at our working space in Canary Wharf, with an exceptional view on London.

jobs.title: Engagement and Community Manager
jobs.description:
CFTE is looking for an Engagement and Community Management associate to nurture our community of learners and develop our alumni network. You will be in charge of assisting our learners throughout their journey making sure they have the best experience. More, you’ll be heading our Alumni network: organizing online-offline, local and global communities and building up projects for them to continue their journey into Finance 2.0. You are a problem solver, you love networking and social event: Empathy and Care are your middle names.
 
Responsibilities include but are not limited to:  
• Generate and enhance high levels of member well-being. 
• Monitor the engagement, build up some reports and suggest actionable inputs to the Management. 
• Build strong relationships with our community of learners online and offline, serving them with care and attention. 
• Identify and act on opportunities to connect members and develop new projects for their Fintech journey. 
• Animate our communities Online and Offline
• Organize and Manage event, from conferences to boot camps to networking events 

Key Qualities: 
• A charismatic individual with customer-facing experience
• An understanding and passion for the entrepreneurial community and Fintech. 
• Ability to set priorities, plan, organize, delegate, and control.
• Impeccable verbal and written communication skills. 
• An expert relationship builder, able to charm and interact with new people in any social setting, as well as maintain a strong personal network
• A passionate team player with excellent drive, fantastic presentation and impeccable phone manner, as well as a natural aptitude for customer service 
• Strong organizational skills with proven ability to multi-task. 
• Interest in career development and personal development.

What’s in it for you?

- Join a rapidly growing company building the future of education in finance. Size doesn’t matter, we are less than 20 but already reached thousands of learns, worked exceptional people from Harvard, Imperial College, HSBC, Citi, Ping An or Lloyds.
- Working on some of the most important topics of today: Digital transformation, Technology disruption, Lifelong learning, Shift to an entrepreneurial age. All of which you will need in the future, whether in a corporate or start-ups.
- Measure rapidly how your input impacts our company and if you can reach hundreds of a learner.
- Expose yourself to the Startup ecosystems in Europe and Asia and be part of the people building it.
- Enjoy and work from Level 39, with an exceptional view on London
- You have what it takes to join us? Tell us what you can do for the company and why we should hire you.

NB: The recruitment process includes a video interview, a case study and a meeting with the cofounders.

jobs.title: Finance and Operations Associate
jobs.description:
CFTE is looking for a Finance and Operations Associate to build up the internal Finance and Admin processes to power the growth of our activities. 
You will work directly with the co-founders and the Operation team and will lead the financial structuration of CFTE's activities. 

You are a problem solver. You love figures and Excel. You have an agile mindset and can jump from a Payroll dilemma to a Venture registration challenge. You are a fast learner, super organised and Fintech enthusiast.

Responsibilities include but are not limited to:  
• Build up Financial Reports 
• Build up Business Intelligence tools and assist the operations with financial and accounting insights
• Implement internal processes and work with the most innovative Fintech Entreprise solutions (Payroll, Taxes, Accounting...)
• Work on Private and Public funding opportunities

Key Qualities:  
•	Self-motivated person with previous experience in business analysis or Corporate Finance,
•	Experience of, or interested in Operations and Administration, ideally in Finance relevant field
•	Analytical and adaptive mind-set, comfortable to confront with ambiguous situation in an agile environment
•	Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written
•	Strong organizational skills and demonstrated ability of interacting and presenting to senior level management and cross-departmental collaboration 
•	An understanding and passion for the entrepreneurial community and Fintech. 
•	Ability to set priorities, plan, organize, delegate, and control.

What’s in it for you?

- Join a rapidly growing company building the future of education in finance. Size doesn’t matter, we are less than 20 but already reached thousands of learns, worked exceptional people from Harvard, Imperial College, HSBC, Citi, Ping An or Lloyds.
- Working on some of the most important topics of today: Digital transformation, Technology disruption, Lifelong learning, Shift to an entrepreneurial age. All of which you will need in the future, whether in a corporate or start-ups.
- Measure rapidly how your input impacts our company and if you can reach hundreds of a learner.
- Expose yourself to the Startup ecosystems in Europe and Asia and be part of the people building it.
- Enjoy and work from Level 39, with an exceptional view on London
- You have what it takes to join us? Tell us what you can do for the company and why we should hire you.

NB: The recruitment process includes a video interview, a case study and a meeting with the cofounders.

jobs.title: FinTech Graduate Programme
jobs.description:
FinTech Graduate Programme:

CFTE is looking for bright talents to join the team and help us push forward our educational mission by scaling our business. We are an education platform, connecting the best CEO, Entrepreneurs and Community member both online and off-line. We started in 2017 and since then grew to 20 team members and have learners from 100 countries. 

Our FinTech Graduate Program is designed for recent graduates interested in Finance and Technology (FinTech), as well as aspiring Entrepreneurs. Our FinTech Graduate Program will provide you with a steep learning experience (you will have a project from day one), boost your professional skills (how to deliver end-to-end a project) and expand your network (reaching out to the 1,000’s CFTE members). 

Our FinTech programme has 4 different tracks. 

1. Product 
2. Sales
3. Marketing
4. Digital

All tracks will provide with :

- Online class & certification on FinTech (learn about AI in Finance but also understand the FinTech industry)
- Assignment of a dedicated project: you will be responsible of projects blending Growth and Process design
- Continuous mentoring and career advice, during office hours, with our Senior Leadership
- Introductions to CFTE Global community of professionals spanning thousands of learners in 60 countries 

There is no requirement for background education. However, we do look for at least one relevant experience in a startup (or other organisation). We also will be looking for signs of outstanding work ethics, pro-active, and entrepreneurial spirit.

We don’t expect you to be an expert in Fintech, this is what we will help you with. However, you do need to be interested in technology and innovation. If you have some curiosity for Finance its also a good start. Most importantly, demonstrate to us your hunger to learn, CFTE has the goal to build a lifelong learning platform, and we need people aligned with our purpose. 

Qualities we look for?

- High Work Ethics
- Self-motivated person with a growth mindset
- Demonstrate the ability to set priorities, organize, delegate and control 
- Business-oriented
- A desire to work with and for entrepreneurs 

What’s in it for you? 

- Join a rapidly growing company building the future of education in finance. Size doesn’t matter, we are less than 20 but already reached thousands of learns, worked exceptional people from Harvard, Imperial College, HSBC, Citi, Ping An or Lloyds. 
- Working on some of the most important topics of today: Digital transformation, Technology disruption, Lifelong learning, Shift to an entrepreneurial age. All of which you will need in the future, whether in a corporate or start-ups. 
- Measure rapidly how your input impacts our company and if you can reach hundreds of a learner.
- Expose yourself to the Startup ecosystems in Europe and Asia and be part of the people building it.
- Enjoy and work from our open office at the Shard, with an exceptional view on London (where the coffee machine is an Ipad and the barista is an engineer). 
- You have what it takes to join us? Tell us who what you can do for the company and why we should hire you. 


NB: The recruitment process includes a video interview, a case study and a meeting with the cofounders.

jobs.title: Analyst / Teaching Assistant
jobs.description:
CFTE is looking for an Analyst / Research Assistant to help CFTE’s Academic team create the best educational product/programs for Fintech and Digital Finance. You will work on projects such as Fintech Research, Curriculum Design, Venture analysis and Content creation. The ideal candidate will be able to bridge strategy with execution, have an analytical and data-driven mindset and match with our motto of Academic Rigour and Entrepreneurial Execution.

You will join the Academic team of CFTE and work directly with CFTE’s Academic Lead, Head of Entrepreneurship and Co-founders. 

You will also be in direct contacts with our Faculty members including industry Experts such as: 
- Claire Calmejane, Head of Innovation @ Societe Generale
- Anne Boden, Cofounder @ Starling Bank
- Ayesha Khanna, CEO of Addo.ai
- Stephan Murer, Ex Global CTO @UBS and Lecturer @ Oxford Said Business School

And many others...

Responsibilities include but are not limited to: 
- Responsible for understanding and documenting curriculum requirements
- Proposing solutions to meet Corporate Training needs
- Researching on key Fintech, Digital Finance trends
- Researching and designing new type of Education Models
- Due Diligence of Experts and Startups: Source, Curate and Validate
- Creating Research Papers, White Papers, Support for presentation

Key Qualities:  
- High Work Ethics
- Self-motivated person with a growth mindset
- Demonstrate the ability to set priorities, organize, delegate and control 
- Business-oriented
- A desire to work with and for entrepreneurs 
- Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written
- An understanding and passion for the entrepreneurial community and Fintech. 

What’s in it for you?

- Join a rapidly growing company building the future of education in finance. - - Size doesn’t matter, we are less than 20 but already reached thousands of learns, worked exceptional people from Harvard, Imperial College, HSBC, Citi, Ping An or Lloyds. 
- Working on some of the most important topics of today: Digital transformation, Technology disruption, Lifelong learning, Shift to an entrepreneurial age. All of which you will need in the future, whether in a corporate or start-ups. 
- Measure rapidly how your input impacts our company and if you can reach hundreds of a learner.
- Expose yourself to the Startup ecosystems in Europe and Asia and be part of the people building it.

jobs.title: Business Development Senior
jobs.description:
Who We Are
The Centre for Finance, Technology & Entrepreneurship is a global provider of corporate training services, online courses and talent development. We believe emerging technologies and innovation are giving birth to a new era of finance, one that can have a positive impact on the lives of billions. We want to use the power of education to train a whole generation of finance professionals to adapt to a world of technology-driven finance and to give them the skills to thrive in this period of step change. 

What makes CFTE special? 
When we say we bet on people - it's not a commercial moto. We really do. We are working hard to create a platform of lifelong learning because we do believe "learn to learn" is the true skill of the 21st century. Naturally, we apply this paradigm to ourselves. 
In the past year, we have grown tremendously, opened offices in London and Singapore, and educated 30,000+ learners in 100+ countries. And we would like to invite outstanding people to join our journey.

Who We Are Looking For:
We are looking for a Senior Business Developer to join us in our London office.  You will be the main driver of our Sales efforts and be instrumental in making CFTE the number one choice for Fintech education and training.

What You Will Be Doing:
Developing strategy, tactics, sales plans and KPI’s for our Corporate Segment
Creating scalable business processes, implementing best practice in sales techniques throughout the sales department
Creating and ensuring we have an effective training programme for sales team, and at the same creating the right environment for sales team/ sales people to succeed
Contributing to the company's overall strategy
Leading by example: showing the team how best to sell over the chat platform, the phone, and meetings
Giving feedback to the product development team and marketing team to improve
Providing key sales data for business leadership (reporting)

Qualities and requirements:
Minimum of 1+ years’ experience as a sales Manager or 3+ years in senior sales roles
Highly motivated sales professional and manager
Successful track record of hitting sales/ revenue targets
Proven ability of building a sales team, hands-on leadership and management experience
Experience in both B2B and B2C context, and in selling over internet chat rooms, and telephone
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Positive can-do attitude, ready to hit the ground running and be flexible to respond quickly to new situations
Very organised, but also business-oriented

What’s in it for you?
On top of a competitive salary, uncapped bonus and the chance to get company shares...
You will be joining a small but highly motivated team who’s building the future of education in finance. Although we’re small, we’re punching way above our weight, and are supported by exceptional people from Harvard, Imperial College, Hong Kong University, HSBC, Citi, Ping An or Lloyds.
You will be working on some of the most important topics of today: Digital transformation, Technology disruption, Lifelong learning and continuous adaptation, Shift to an entrepreneurial age.
You will have direct inputs on a global project aimed to train hundreds of thousands of people.
You can expect to be working closely with and trained by people who are amongst the top Fintech influencers and have coached dozens of entrepreneurs.
You will have access to our latest educational content and develop a true understanding of Fintech – starting with Around Fintech in 8 hours, our fintech foundation course, moving on to AI in Finance – the leading course about Artificial Intelligence in Finance.
You will also be exposed to the Startup ecosystems in Europe and Asia. And participate to the construction of an ecosystem of exceptional people and organizations.
Finally, you will be joining us at our working space in Level39, with an exceptional view on London.

jobs.title: Fintech Content Intern
jobs.description:
We are looking for a highly motivated Digital Content Creator for an internship position. An all-rounder, with innovative ideas and skills in videography and post-production. Who can help us create content for our fintech education platform.

You will be smart, hardworking, entrepreneurial and passionate with a real desire to learn and develop. There are no strict educational requirements, but you will be versed with creative skills and knowledge.

We do not expect you to be an expert in Fintech but an interest in technology and innovation with some curiosity for Finance is a good start.

Responsibilities (include but are not limited to):

- Coming up with new ideas for content and pushing our online platforms such as Youtube
 
- Creating, Recording and Post-Production of videos for our product   development, content marketing and communication.

- Photography for our marketing and communication.

- Designing and creating communication and marketing materials for our different channels.

- Improving our existing visual identity.

- Ensuring the consistency of our branding across all channels. 



The Ideal Candidate will have the following skills:

- Story-telling and script writing. 

- Experience and skills in Adobe Creative Suite - Premiere Pro, After Effects, Photoshop and Illustrator. 

- Skills in Photography, Videography and Graphic Design.

- Animations skills, while not necessary, would be a big plus.

- Interest in branding, creating communication/marketing content and educational pieces.

- Ability to prioritise and work effectively in a fast moving environment. 

- A blend of creativity, practicality and adaptability.



What’s in it for you?

You will get the opportunity to learn, develop and broaden your creative skill-set, in a collaborative and practical environment. You will be hands on and be involved in big projects from the beginning, so it is a great opportunity for someone looking to push on in digital content creation.

You’ll be joining a growing, highly motivated team, who is building the future of education in finance. Working alongside some of the largest institutions in the world, like Paypal, and supported by exceptional people from Harvard, Imperial College, Hong Kong University, HSBC, Citi, Ping An and Lloyds.

You’ll be exposed to the start-up and fintech ecosystems in Europe, Asia, Canada, the Middle East and Africa and have direct inputs on global projects aimed at thousands of professionals. 
 
Finally you’ll be joining us at our working space at Level39, Canary Wharf, with probably the best view in London.

If you’d like to join, get in touch!

jobs.title: HK - Country Lead
jobs.description:
About the Role:

We are looking for the lead to open our Hong Kong office. The position will support our current commitment to the development of Hong Kong's Human Capital training agenda, following an appointment by the Hong Kong Government. You will be working on deepening our existing relationships and building a new business roadmap. Part of the role will give you access to the CFTE network of international experts and local start-ups. You will directly work with our Singapore and London offices. 

About your responsibilities

- Develop partnerships and manage relationships with government and private sector stakeholders
- Research and map out supply landscape in Human Capital Training
- Research demand and market sizing 
- Build a fully autonomous Team to cover the Hong Kong market 
- Develop pipeline and develop market launch campaign strategy
- Create a marketing strategy to scale the client base and increase visibility
- Contribute to and execute the company's overall strategy
- Give feedback to the product development team & marketing team for product improvements

About you:

- Self-driven: you will build a new office, therefore self-motivation will be key until the full team is in place
- Work ethics: flawless execution is something we expect, you will also need to lead by example your team
- Entrepreneurial Mindset: Any new office and projects come with challenges, you need to be a natural problem solver
- Demonstrate the ability to set priorities, organize, delegate and control
- Process-driven with the ability to see the bigger picture
- Excellent relationship and communication skills, both verbal and written
- An understanding and passion for Finance and Tech

What’s in it for you?

- Join the fastest-growing company building the future of education in finance.
- Work on some of the most important topics of today: digital transformation, technology disruption, lifelong learning, shift to an entrepreneurial age. All of which you will need in the future, whether in a corporation or start-ups.
- Measure rapidly how your input impacts our company and if you help us scale in APAC.
- Expose yourself to the AI and Fintech ecosystems in Europe and Asia and be part of the people building it.

jobs.title: HK Analyst
jobs.description:
Our management team is in HK until the 11th of Feb and will conduct face to face interviews with selected participants.

About the role:

CFTE is looking for a Business Analyst to help accelerate our expansion to Hong Kong. The position will be to support our current commitment to developing Hong Kong's Human Capital training agenda, following an appointment by the Hong Kong Government. You will be working on deepening our existing relationships and building a new business roadmap. Part of the role will give you access to the CFTE network of international experts and local start-ups. You will be working directly with the Hong Kong country lead and collaborating with our Singapore and London offices.
About your responsibilities: 

- Assisting in the end-to-end development of new courses, including conducting initial research, contacting experts and lecturers, assisting on product design, and creating content 
- Undertaking competitor analysis of online courses and suggesting ways to improve the existing processes
- Preparing a database of potential experts and lecturers to support our activities
- Driving outreach efforts to key stakeholders in the region
-Assisting with the planning and execution of CFTE events in Hong Kong
Contributing to the creation of research whitepapers and business proposals

About your qualities:

- High Work Ethics
- Self-motivated person with a growth mindset
- Demonstrate the ability to set priorities, organise, delegate and control
- Business-oriented
- A desire to work in an entrepreneurial environment 

What is in it for you: 

- Join the fastest-growing company building the future of education in finance.
- Work on some of the most exciting topics of today, including Digital Transformation, disruptive business models, and emerging technologies
- Expand your network and be part of the AI and FinTech ecosystems in Europe, Asia, and the Middle East
- Develop your skill-set by working with a variety of stakeholders, from start-ups, to corporates and regulators
- Work in a fast-paced environment
- Accelerate your career

Compensation:

£20k – £30k

  • Demonstrate the ability to set priorities, organize, delegate and control
  • Process-driven with the ability to see the bigger picture
  • Excellent relationship and communication skills, both verbal and written
  • An understanding and passion for Finance and Tech

What’s in it for you?

  • Join the fastest-growing company building the future of education in finance.
  • Working on some of the most important topics of today: Digital transformation, Technology disruption, Lifelong learning, Shift to an entrepreneurial age. All of which you will need in the future, whether in a corporation or start-ups.
  • Measure rapidly how your input impacts our company and if you help us scale in APAC
  • Expose yourself to the AI and Fintech ecosystems in Europe and Asia and be part of the people building it.

Compensation:

$30k – $40k

jobs.title: IT engineer
jobs.description:
CFTE is  a young European-based startup into fintech education for professionals with a small office in Singapore and seeking an IT lead who is highly motivated, with a swiss-knife mindset to take ownership and responsibility of the current overall CFTE tools and platforms. Based in Singapore or London, the IT engineer is in charge of ensuring smooth day to day IT operations of the platform while configuring / implementing or coding new features on the platform looking also at its scalability to support the growth of the company. A first professional experience in development is needed, we expect candidates in the range of 2 to 7 years of experience, the salary range given covers this range in our startup context. This role is fit for individuals who value ownership, involvement, continuous upskilling in a fast changing environment over stable positions at a steady pace. 
 
The platform is made up mainly of different SaaS solutions (MOOC solution, CRM solution...), Web components (running on Wordpress) and APIs which are custom dev running on AWS.
 
Scope:
- Ensure on a day to day basis the stability of the overall platform (monitor daily synchronizations between systems, accuracy of the reports generated to the teams…)
- Collaborate with CFTE’s teams to understand the business roadmap and build the tech roadmap accordingly, identifying what needs to be done to scale the systems accordingly, assess new solutions (e.g implementation of SSO mechanism with certain clients)
- Own the overall architecture of the platform and identify how to make it evolve smartly 
- Identify and implement tech initiatives which can lead to better productivity for the different teams (automation of onboarding of clients, automation of reports, etc…) 
- Build and manage on an ongoing basis the backlog of improvements / new features / technical issues in production by collaborating and getting feedbacks from the different teams using the platform (marketing, business development, operations…)
- Configure the SaaS solutions, code / test / deploy on AWS the different web components and APIs (PHP / Javascript / Java as of today). Possibly decide to switch to GCP if it makes more sense for CFTE.
- As the company grows up, possibly drive some contractors to augment development capacity or interns / new hires if the tech team grows up.
 
Requirements:
- Super Tech savvy mindset, not afraid to discover new tools and technologies on his/her own, play around with technologies to see what can be done. A self learner who can identify the best way to ramp up his/her skills in different domains depending on the needs and growth of the startup: AWS/GCP, development language, SaaS configurations, BI/analytics, SSO connectivity between the SaaS education platforms and B2B customers...
- Not an expert in development, but a first operational experience of development and keen on upskilling oneself. Custom dev represents today about 20% of the information system, the rest being configuration of SAAS platforms. Keen on doing development on Front end and Back end and learn / bring in the relevant languages as needed (Javascript, API in Java…)
- Mindset of continuous improvement to identify with the business and operations teams all things that can be optimized / automated through tech and implement these improvements
- Analytical skills to be able to define a solution in details avoiding loopholes and then implement it, while being able to communicate the overall picture for non tech people to understand. Example: come up with an approach to get clean data in the CRM system and implement it.
- Strong team player: the IT engineer will be the one who will be the go to person in CFTE for all things related to tech, so he/she needs to be at ease in communication, both oral and written (with team in Europe) and genuinely wanting to collaborate
- Strong sense of ownership and proactive: this is a startup, so don’t expect to have someone telling you everything that must be done, instead identify things that must be done for the good of the company and the teams, bring the topics on the table, discuss them and then get them done.

jobs.title: Marketing Intern
jobs.description:
We are looking for a highly motivated Marketing Intern. An all-rounder with skills in social media management, content creation and graphic design who will help us in the execution of the marketing campaigns for our new products.

You will be hardworking, entrepreneurial and passionate with a real desire to learn and develop. There are no strict educational requirements, but you will be versed with creative skills and knowledge.

We do not expect you to be an expert in Fintech but an interest in technology and innovation with some curiosity for Finance is a good start.


Responsibilities (include but are not limited to):

- Social Media Management - posts writing, analytics and engagement 
- Content Writing - for the blog, video scripts and others
- Public Relations - press releases preparation and distribution
- Email Marketing - newsletter and other campaigns 
- Ensuring the consistency of our branding across all channels.


The Ideal Candidate will have the following skills:

- Experience in photography and graphic design - Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator / Canva.
- Interest in branding, creating communication/marketing content and educational pieces.
- Interest in Financial Technologies.
- Ability to learn fast and prioritise work effectively in a fast-moving environment.
- A blend of creativity, practicality and adaptability.

What’s in it for you?

You will get the opportunity to learn, develop and broaden your creative skill-set, in a collaborative and practical environment. You will be hands-on and be involved in big projects from the beginning, so it is a great opportunity for someone looking to start their career in marketing and communications.

You’ll be joining a growing, highly motivated team, who is building the future of education in finance. Working alongside some of the largest institutions in the world, like Paypal, and supported by exceptional people from Harvard, Imperial College, Hong Kong University, HSBC, Citi, Ping An and Lloyds.

You’ll be exposed to the start-up and fintech ecosystems in Europe, Asia, Canada, the Middle East and Africa, and have direct inputs on global projects aimed at thousands of professionals.

Finally, you’ll be earning a £1,000 a month and joining us at Level39, Canary Wharf, with probably the best view in London!

If you’d like to join, get in touch!

jobs.title: Operations & Tech Intern
jobs.description:
CFTE is looking for one highly motivated Operations & Tech Intern who would like to take part in CFTE’s journey. The ideal candidate will be delivering programmes to our clients but also you will be in charge of delivering projects to support CFTE’s growth

Ideal start date: ASAP

Job Summary:
-	Operations structuring: The operations analyst is a key member of the operations team supporting data management, client reporting, and problem resolution. This person will work closely with the Operation manager to ensure the best level of services.
-	Automating analytics & processes in the company: You would be working alongside our Operation Manager in structuring and implementing new technologies in automating overall processes.
-            Customer relationship management: You will be ensuring that there is constant engagement with our customers; resolving customer support quickly and efficiently.
-            Working across teams: The key here is to be agile to work and support the teams across all departments; Product, Growth, Operations & Business Development, providing them with the right tools and analytics to achieve new goals!

What’s in it for you?
You’ll be joining a highly motivated team that's building the future of education in finance, also being supported by exceptional people from Harvard, Imperial College, Hong Kong University, HSBC, Citi, Ping An and Lloyds.   
You can expect to be trained by someone who is amongst the top Fintech influencers and has coached dozens of young graduates and entrepreneurs. 
You will access CFTE’s leading courses (AI in Finance, Around Fintech in 8 hours)
You will also be exposed to the Startup ecosystems in Europe and Asia.
This internship is a great experience for anyone who wants to thrive in the startup ecosystem, but also understand how large organisations work. 

Requirements:
There is no requirement in terms of background education, but having at least one relevant experience in a startup (or other organisation) & being smart, hardworking, and entrepreneurial are a must. You’re not expected to be an expert in Fintech but interest for technology and innovation with some curiosity for Finance is a good start. 

Basic Qualifications:
• Preferable 1 year+  experience in management consulting, operations, sales analysis, investment banking or tech company corporate strategy group
• Experience using Excel (lookups, pivots, formulas) and facility with file formatting and manipulation as well as Powerpoint
• Attention to detail
• Basic experience in data analysis and the ability to use data to drive insights and decision-making
• Experience working in high-growth, performance-focused and always changing environments

Preferred Qualifications:
• Experience working with AppScript, JavaScript 
• Demonstrates ability to work autonomously and where necessary problem-solve with limited guidancel
• HTML, CSS, Javascript
• Information System design and Data Architecture
• API development and Automation Workflow

jobs.title: People & Talent Analyst
jobs.description:
CFTE is looking for a People & Talent Analyst to put our team on rockets. You’ll work directly with the senior Management on acquiring the right talent, create the right environment for the team to deliver great work as well as building the tracks for the company and Talent’s exponential growth. You will be at the crossroads of People, Culture, Organisation, Operations and Growth. You will be elementary in shaping CFTE’s team for an exponential impact. You are a problem solver, you love people and career paths, and you build processes that scale. Empathy and Care are your middle names.

Responsibilities include but are not limited to:
Own the recruitment pipeline: refine the talent acquisition process and enable the growth of our teams in London, Singapore, Hong Kong, Abu Dhabi and more.
Refine the onboarding process to positively impact the new starter experience
Design team activities, perks and behaviours enabling bonding, diffusion of CFTE’s values and happiness in the offices. 
Implement a team learning agenda and exponential career tracks through performance reviews and adaptive support
Manage payrolls and refine our compensation matrix to accompany our growth

Key Qualities:
• A charismatic individual with people-facing experience
• An understanding and passion for career development and personal development
• Ability to set priorities, plan, organize, delegate, and control.
• Exceptional attention to detail and Process Driven approach
• Impeccable verbal and written communication skills. 
• An expert relationship builder, able to connect and interact with new people in any social setting, as well as maintain a strong personal network
• A passionate team player with excellent drive, fantastic presentation and impeccable phone manner, as well as a natural aptitude for customer care 
• Strong organizational skills with proven ability to multitask. 
• Interest in Entrepreneurship and the Startup Ecosystem



What’s in it for you?

- Join a rapidly growing company building the future of education in finance. Size doesn’t matter, we are less than 20 but already reached thousands of learns, worked exceptional people from Harvard, Imperial College, HSBC, Citi, Ping An or Lloyds.
- Working on some of the most important topics of today: Digital transformation, Technology disruption, Lifelong learning, Shift to an entrepreneurial age. All of which you will need in the future, whether in a corporate or start-ups.
- Measure rapidly how your input impacts our company and if you can reach hundreds of learners.
- Expose yourself to the Startup ecosystems in Europe and Asia and be part of the people building it.
- Work from Level 39, with an exceptional view on London
- You have what it takes to join us? Tell us what you can do for the company and why we should hire you.

NB: The recruitment process includes a video interview, a case study and a meeting with the cofounders.

jobs.title: Project Manager
jobs.description:
CFTE is seeking a Project Manager who is highly motivated and able to play a key role driving the strategy of CFTE in the Middle-East. Based in Abu Dhabi, the Project Manager is in charge of both Operations and Business Development to grow CFTE’s presence in the region, while collaborating day to day with teams in London, Singapore and Hong Kong.

Responsibilities include but are not limited to: 
- Meeting set daily, weekly, and monthly sales targets
- Organising and maintaining your own pipeline, ensuring nothing is missed
- Using CRM system to effectively document and track progress
- Proposing solutions to meet Corporate Training needs
- Researching on key Fintech, Digital Finance trends in the region and globally
- Due Diligence of Experts and Startups: Source, Curate and Validate
- Creating Research Papers, White Papers, Support for presentation
- Contributing to building training programme for sales team, and creating scalable processes
- Contributing to the company's overall strategy
- Giving feedback to the product development team and marketing team to improve

Key Requirements and Qualities:  
- At least 2 years of professional experience.
- High Work Ethics
- Self-motivated person with a growth mindset
- Excellent academic background
- Demonstrate the ability to set priorities, organize, delegate and control 
- Process-drive with the ability to see the bigger picture
- Excellent relationship and communication skills, both verbal and written
- An understanding and passion for AI, Data and Fintech. 

What’s in it for you?
- Join the fastest-growing company building the future of education in finance.
- Working on some of the most important topics of today: Digital transformation, Technology disruption, Lifelong learning, Shift to an entrepreneurial age. All of which you will need in the future, whether in a corporation or start-ups. 
- Measure rapidly how your input impacts our company and if you help us scale in the Middle-East
- Expose yourself to the AI and Fintech ecosystems in Europe and Asia and be part of the people building it.
